full_threads.body:
All good on ths one.

https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/2918056873/151606
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Support Team,

Ramin let me know over text 'There is still one on the top banner'.



On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 12:55 PM Andy Crebar wrote:

> Hi Ramin,
>
> I just received your screenshots and included here for our support team.
>
> They will review and update you once fixed.
>
> Thanks,
> Andy

Hi there.

We received a support request to remove some blank space on mobile for
your website.

Could you please share where this is? We have been unable to find it.

As a reminder, Marable is only a hosting only plan so this will be charged
separately to your plan. Wolf IQ's Care plans cover website support.

Once we know where it is, it should be quick to fix.

All good on this one @andy I have created a different ticket.

For some reason there is an overlap with tickets so I have been creating a new message

Hi Ramin,

I just received your screenshots and included here for our support team.

They will review and update you once fixed.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Team,

Apologies that you couldn't access the site with the URL I provided.

I believe this is the correct one.

Log In ‹ Rook Partners - WordPress

Username: andreas@rookpartners.com

Password: Ernie291083!

Please let me know if you need anything further.

Kind regards,

Andrea

Andrea Sevilla Marketing Manager (Work days Mon, Tues, Wed only)



+61 401 174 669
+61 2 8067 0855 andreas@rookpartners.com Connect on LinkedIn

Level 25, 259 George St Sydney NSW 2000

CAUTION: This message may contain confidential information intended only for the use of the addressee named above. If you are not the intended recipient of this message you are hereby notified that any use, dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this message is prohibited. If you received this message in error please notify Mail Administrators immediately. Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender and may not necessarily reflect the views of Rook Sheu Pty Ltd t/a Rook Partners.
(Time: 90mins)

Hi Adrian,

Confirming the pages are updated.

https://ezymove.com.au/4-5t-truck-removal-service/
https://ezymove.com.au/11t-truck-removal-service/

Regarding the ezycleans 25%, I'll reply to a separate ticket.

Great thank you, please launch

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

Sure, all good on this one.

Thanks joel can u reduce the size of the inital rate and make the discounted rates and info bold? Just so the customer doesnt automatically look at the initial rate and then not continue to read.

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

Confirming we have updated the pricing. Please confirm if this is correct.

1: Please keep the original price 156.
Maybe highlight the discounts below to make it more readable and pleasing to the customer. Im not sure if you have any siggestions about this^

Everything else yes thank you.

I would much rather 25% automatically on the checkout for now

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

Thanks for your patience. We have updated the site.

  1. Done. Please see the attached
  2. Done, regarding the ezycleans, we just want to confirm, Do you prefer doing it as a coupon CLEAN25 or automatically applied to checkout?
  3. Done. Please see the attached
  4. Done. Please see the attached

Let me know if you have any changes.

https://ezymove.com.au/4-5t-truck-removal-service/
https://ezymove.com.au/11t-truck-removal-service/
(Time: 30mins) @andy

action.text: Andy Crebar assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Adrian,

Thanks for the time on the call.

Confirming these are the priorities our team is working on.

Please refer to this spreadsheet as the source of truth for the ~45 things we have received from you to complete.

@joel will complete the pricing changes (Items 1, 2, 3 and 4 below) and confirm today.

The other items will continue next week.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Adrian,

Thanks for your message — I completely understand your frustration, and you're absolutely right: communication should have been better. I sincerely apologize for the lack of updates.

Jumping into the changes:
  • The deposit has been updated to $100 on the Ezy Move checkout.
  • This will also be reflected in the price links for both trucks.
Regarding additional payment options:
  • Bank Transfer: We can add this to the checkout page. Please send through the bank name, account number, BSB, and the email address where receipts should be sent.
  • Afterpay for Deposits: We’re looking into integrating this — do you have a specific Afterpay option or provider you’d prefer us to use?

We're also working on the other requested changes and will send you a full update shortly.

Thanks Joel, communication is the only issue. If we dont communicate time frames and cannot respond to enquiries then that keeps me and my business in the dark: its been about 3 months since i initially requested for a website upgrade which is absolutely cruicial for our business to continue to run. All i ask is for communication. Thank you

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Adrian,

I sincerely apologize for the delay in getting back to you — I completely understand your frustration, and I’m really sorry for the inconvenience caused.
We’re prioritizing this now and will be in touch with you shortly to resolve the issue.

I need better support, i try calling theres no responses. I try emailing theres no responses. I need someone to contact me because i am not happy with the support at this point in time and if it continues then i wont proceed

Get Outlook for iOS

Hi Andy,

Do you have a timeline for when we can expect the upgrades?

Regards,
Adrian

Get Outlook for iOS
